sentences.en: ...taking tiny bites of a hot dog and daintily wiping my lips with a napkin.
sentences.cn: …小口咬着热狗并用餐巾文雅地擦着我的嘴唇。

sentences.en: He dabbed at his lips with the napkin.
He dabbed at the spot on his tie with a napkin.
sentences.cn: 他用餐巾快速擦去领带上的污点.

sentences.en: He flicked at the spot with a napkin.
sentences.cn: 他用餐巾轻轻擦了一下这块斑迹.

sentences.en: He picked the napkin from his lap and placed it alongside his plate.
sentences.cn: 他拿起腿上的餐巾，放在盘子旁边。

sentences.en: He was wiping his eyes with his napkin.
He wiped away the blood with a paper napkin.
I paused where I was with my napkin in my hand.
sentences.cn: 我迟疑了一下,手里还拿着餐巾.

sentences.en: I put a napkin by my plate.
sentences.cn: 我把一条餐巾放在碟子旁边.

sentences.en: Mary Ann tore the edge off her napkin.
sentences.cn: 玛丽·安撕掉了餐巾的边儿。

sentences.en: Michael mopped up quickly with his napkin.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔迅速用餐巾将其揩干。

sentences.en: She was taking tiny bites of a hot dog and daintily wiping her lips with a napkin.
sentences.cn: 她小口地吃着热狗，用餐巾优雅地擦着嘴。

sentences.en: The curve - edged hobbing cutter is used in producing rectangular wing sanitary napkin.
sentences.cn: 曲线刃滚切刀是用来加工护翼卫生巾的专用刀具.

sentences.en: To the British, however, he word " napkin " or " nappy " actually means " diaper. "
sentences.cn: 然而在英国人的词汇中, “napkin(餐巾) ” 或写作 “ nappy ”这个词实际意义为 “ 尿布(diaper) ”.

trans.tran_cn: 餐巾，餐巾纸，尿布，（女士）卫生巾
trans.tran_en: a square piece of cloth or paper used for protecting your clothes and for cleaning your hands and lips during a meal
